sentence.Network_en: When I first held it in my hand, I was wonder - struck.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我第一次握住它时, 我惊讶不已.

sentence.Network_en: Several hundred workers struck in sympathy with their colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百名工人罢工以声援他们的同事。

sentence.Network_en: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentence.Network_cn: 我干脆利落地击球，命中了目标。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 请问可以提供W开头的形容... ... wonderless--- 平凡无奇的 wonder-struck--- 大吃一惊的,惊讶不已的 wrathful--- 大怒的;愤怒的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W) ... wonder 奇迹 wonder-struck 吃惊不小的 wonder-working 创造奇迹的.
I wonder how he did it. 不知道他是怎么做那件事的。 继承用法  wonder-struck,wonder-stricken adj. 大吃一惊的, 惊讶不已的习惯用语  a nine day.

list.abs: so that the wonder struck the crowd ., 所以群众创造奇迹.
I was struck with wonder as I saw the train for the first time ., 我第一次看见火车时真是惊讶不已.

means.word_mean: 1. affected by or overcome with wonder
